name: Zenith 440L Stationary THOMPSON Table
descr:
440L-Zenith Stationary THOMPSON Table

Our Zenith Thompson Tables are acclaimed to be one of the finest tables available. This stationary model has all four drops (air powered)as standard features. 

Features:

5 Year Limited Parts Warranty 
Tilt Headpiece 
Forward Motion Headpiece w/ lo-force drop mechanism 
Universal Headraiser raises or tilts 
Face Paper Toweling and Dispenser 
Soft Hinged Dorsal 
Terminal Point Dorsal Drop - Pneumatic 
Terminal Point Abdominal Drop - Pneumatic 
Slide & Crank Pelvic 
Terminal Point Pelvic 3-way Drop - Pneumatic 
Adjustable Front Section 
Adjustable Ankle Rest Cushion 
Chrome Base Finish 
Heritage Upholstery in a variety of colors 
Table Length 72 
Table Height 18, 20, 22, or 24" 
Table Width 24 
Cushion Width 18 
Table Weight 210 lbs. depending on options
